## IIdentityWallet.getProfilesByDID() method

gets profile identity by genesis identifiers

**Signature:**

```typescript
getProfilesByDID(did: DID): Promise<Profile[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  did | DID | genesis identifier from which profile has been derived |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Profile](./js-sdk.profile.md)\[\]&gt;

`{Promise<Profile[]>}`
